item.title: Upcoming Blogs Idea
item.description: Lately, I’ve been learning stuffs about Devops, and mainly focusing on Kubernetes. In few of the upcoming posts, I’d like to share some stuffs about my learning process, few blockers I’ve faced, and so on. I’m also planning to create one post related to how this website is created. Peace out ðŸ¤ž

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Ashish, a Junior Python Developer and Software Engineer. I’m currently a final year student of undergraduate in Computer Engineering. For those who came upon this in a drunken stupor and don’t know where they are, this is my personal site where I will post about random things which may or may not be useful. So, I welcome you here, where everything is about me and I am the center of the world.

item.title: Welcome Post
item.description: This is my first post. I’m trying to create my blog using hugo, let’s see how this works. I’ll try to keep this site updated. Hopefully.
